price: 30. Sinni gennaaqoh agabuu kee sinni say naqoosay ken gabá timlike akke waytek, toysa diggah usun qeemu maloonuuy, yassacakken mara hinnon.
arabic: إِلَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَزۡوَٰجِهِمۡ أَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَٰنُهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ غَيۡرُ مَلُومِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: illā ʿalā azwājihim aw mā malakat aymānuhum fa-innahum ghayru malūmīna
